tool_description: Processes X-ray images to reveal internal structure, support materials, and hidden elements within artwork, providing crucial information for authentication and conservation planning.

analysis_focus.description: Aspects to analyze (support structure, paint layers, hidden elements, damage)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Invalid X-ray parameters: Voltage must be 10-100 kV, exposure time 0.1-10 seconds.
X-ray safety violation: Ensure proper radiation safety protocols are followed.
Empty analysis focus: Must specify at least one aspect to analyze.
Insufficient image quality: X-ray image quality insufficient for reliable analysis.
usage: Reference artwork record and specify analysis focus areas. Tool processes X-ray images to reveal internal structure and hidden features.

support_analysis.description: Analysis of canvas, panel, or other support materials

layer_structure.description: Paint and preparation layers visible in X-ray

hidden_elements.description: Previously unknown elements revealed by X-ray
